title: Orc Ambusher (1C261)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Sauron
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Minion • Orc
Strength:	5
Vitality:	2
Site:	6
Game Text:	Tracker. The roaming penalty for each [Sauron] minion you play is -1. Response: If a Free Peoples regroup event is played, exert this minion to cancel that event.
Lore:	”'Orcs will often pursue foes for many leagues….'”
Rarity:	C
Notes:	This The Fellowship of the Ring card was misprinted in the Gimli Mines of Moria starter deck. The word “non-native” should be ”roaming. “
